pr_title: FCREPO-3399 - External URI case sensitivity and handling changes

timeline.message: Fix issue with external content where the validator would reject file paths containing capital letters in case sensitive file systems
Clear proxy or redirect uri for external binaries when switching external binary handling. Back port integration tests for external binary handling
